request.description:
Required to initialise a new Cookie-Session for SPAs.
Do not use this endpoint if you want to use Token-Auth.

After you send a GET-request to /api/handshake, which will create the Session and give you a XSRF-Token, you can send your Credentials to this endpoint and authenticate your session. All further requests are now authenticated through cookies and do not require an Authorization-Header.
If you get an Error 419, make sure your Request contains the X-XSRF-TOKEN header.

You can enable this in axios with the following line: 

axios.defaults.withCredentials = true;

If you are not able to use Cookies, for example in a mobile application, you can use Token-Auth instead. Tokens will be valid for 20 hours before they expire.
Endpoints under the /admin path will not be available for Applications using Token-Auth.
